attributes.title: Rrrrrr role up to the party

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to get information on Trumpâ€™s rallies and his campaign updates. However, when I used it for only the first 3 minutes, my phone was glitching, restarting itself, and then my phone lost its battery within 20 minutes after because the effects the app. I donâ€™t recommend downloading this app. America doesnâ€™t seem better with this app.
attributes.title: Yikes.

attributes.review: Sub-par app for a sub-par president. Riddled with grammatical and mechanical errors. Makes me sad that heâ€™s trying to divide the country even further when what we need more than ever is for someone to bring us together again. I am an American patriot in that I want to create a world where my friends feel welcome in their own country instead of being ashamed of and embarrassed by the person who runs it.

attributes.title: Great app!

attributes.review: DO NOT GET THIS APP i was literally scrolling while eating cereal and then all of the sudden the milk in my bowl started to spray me but stopped every time i closed the app. later i opened it again and i heard a crash, i ran into the next room AND MY BATHTUB FELL THROUGH THE CEILING AND CRUSHED MY CAT. now every time i open the app i get a phone call saying that my social security number was stolen, my bank was broken into or that someone popped my tires!! DO NOT DOWNLOAD UNLESS YOU WISH TO BE CURSED.
attributes.title: WORST APP ON THE PLANET

attributes.review: This app is like ripping the eyes off of your dogâ€™s favorite toys. It is cruel to both your eyes, and the dog toysâ€™. I celebrated the deletion of this app with kiddie champagne (bc grape juice is superior) and sparklers. Now that patriotism if Iâ€™ve ever seen it. I also would like to inform everyone that those who download this app will be like chain mail from 2010: forever cursed with bad luck in 7 years. Like breaking a mirror I think. Anyway itâ€™s bad do not support.
attributes.title: Terrible

attributes.review: Just like its namesake, this app is completely useless in every way. Itâ€™s racist, bigoted, homophobic, and a classic narcissist. Oh wait, thatâ€™s not the app that tRump. The good news is that it was free, so at least (unlike the United States) I wonâ€™t be ruined financially. While reviewing this app, I did have the opportunity to cheat on my wife while she was in labor, so at least I shared a moment with this apps namesake. #makeappsgreatagain
attributes.title: What does this app actually do?

attributes.review: Got this to see what our misogynistic, xenophobic, homophobic, transphobic, rapist and racism white supremacist of a president was doing and wow it was worse than I thought. Canâ€™t believe a narcissistic disgusting orange mess of human is allowed to be president but clearly we see that we are all worse than we were in 2016 and so letâ€™s just call this a growing period and move on from a sad orange baby pretending he can be in a position of power.
